content.rendered:
This week in our weekly update we have fixed some old issues and brought in some new features. What are they? let’s find out.

What’s new:

  • Individual wallet profiling with demographics
  • Multiple Editable Support for multi-chain support on Testnet and Mainnet.
  • Included daily alerts to notify dApp owners of important notifications such as; $ value drops daily and more.
  • Wallet labeling of users by analyzing their activity on dApp.
  • Revamp and Redesign of Wallet Detail screen.
  • Mainnet and Testnet Support for BSC.

What’s fixed:

  • Validation on SDK integration.
  • Firebase Token logout issue.
  • Change in Configuration Screens.

Spock needs your feedback to improve more. Visit spockanalytics.xyz and use our free interactable demo and provide us with your feedback at hello@spockanalytics.xyz.
